dcterms:creator: R. A. H. Karim
I. Vassányi
I. Kósa
dcterms:description: The Nutrition Absorption dataset includes continuous glucose monitor (CGM) recordings from 5 participants (4 male, 1 female, Age: 51.6 ± 16.1 y). All individuals were given a total of 167 meals under fasting condition. The dataset includes meal macronutrient amounts, time elapsed since the last insulin dose, pre-meal blood glucose levels, and CGM data spanning four hours post-meal.
dcterms:title: Nutrition Absorption Dataset

dcterms:creator: C. R. Marling
R. C. Bunescu
dcterms:description: The OhioT1DM dataset is an eight-week long clinical study of 12 deidentified T1 diabetes patients. Participants used insulin pumps and CGM sensors. Their physiological data was recorded on wristbands while their self-reported carbohydrate intake, work, and exercise intensities were recorded on smartphones. The target class is set for each meal by categorizing the post-prandial glycemic response into hyperglycemia and normoglycemia.
dcterms:title: OhioT1DM Dataset
